name: 7 Balls
description:
The classic is back!

Insert a coin. Wait for the right moment to release the ball.

Will you hit the pot or just miss it? Try again and hit the pot 7 times in a row and be the greatest 7 Balls player.

This is the 10 years commemorative edition of 7 Balls. The first ever released game made by Granada Studio (creators of _M_, M3T4, Upsolom, Imanente, Errante) that first appeared on iOS and after many requests now you can play on your Android device, fully remodeled in full 3D giving a better experience to the player.

Try it! Love it! Repeat!

Find more games at granada.itch.io

FEATURING: 

. Clear crisp minimalist and colorful graphics ;

. Unobtrusive menus, jump fast into action ;

. Highly replayable skill-based gameplay ;

. Very simple controls.
